title: New: Colour Coding – Kick
content:
Operator Please know their way around a pop track, so it makes sense that Colour Coding, the side-project of Chris Holland and Tim Commandeur, also embodies the spirit of huge, joyous indie anthems.

Having announced themselves in November of last year with the effervescent Perfect, the duo are back with the insanely danceable Kick. Sure, it’s not breaking boundaries musically, but it’s indie-pop songwriting at it’s utmost enjoyable. Stream Kick below, and check out their debut EP Proof which drops later in the year.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
